summary.description:
Experience elevated living at Purva Atmosphere.
Set across 13 acres of landscaped greenery near Manyata Tech Park, these luxury 3 BHK residences in Thanisandra offer rare calm amidst North Bangalore?s growth corridor. Thoughtfully designed spacious homes, refined amenities, and seamless connectivity to IT hubs, top schools, and lifestyle destinations create a perfect balance of serenity and city convenience.

A private sanctuary for those who value space, sophistication, and location.
highlights: 9 acres of open, thoughtfully planned luxury living
Iconic rooftop clubhouse with sky deck, theatre & cloud walk
40-ft Air Filtration Tower for cleaner, healthier living
Global lifestyle amenities curated for elevated urban living

aboutBuilder.name: Puravankara

meta.title: About the Developer
meta.subtitle: A trusted name with a proven track record in delivering quality homes
meta.tagline: Built on credibility. Known for consistency.

aboutBuilder.description: Puravankara Limited, headquartered in Bengaluru, is one of India?s most admired and trusted home builders and is recognized among the top real estate companies in India, with a legacy of excellence spanning over 50 years. Founded in 1975, the company is known for delivering high-quality homes on time with complete transparency.
aboutBuilder.descriptionExpanded: Puravankara has launched three prominent brands, each catering to distinct market segments. Puravankara itself is recognized for its luxurious, state-of-the-art projects that incorporate innovative technology to redefine future homes. Provident Housing Ltd., a wholly-owned subsidiary launched in 2008, addresses the needs of mid-income homeowners. Purva Land, established in 2021, offers a lucrative investment opportunity through plotted developments, responding to the evolving needs of homebuyers. Additionally, Starworth Infrastructure and Construction Limited (SICL) provides technology-enabled construction solutions. Puravankara also has a strong presence in commercial office spaces.

meta.title: Frequently Asked Questions
meta.subtitle: Everything you need to know before making a decision

faqs.title: Where is Purva Atmosphere located?
items: Purva Atmosphere is located in Thanisandra, North Bangalore, close to Manyata Tech Park, offering excellent connectivity to Hebbal, ORR, Airport Road, and key business hubs.

faqs.title: What type of homes are available at Purva Atmosphere?
items: Purva Atmosphere offers spacious 3 BHK luxury apartments, designed with large layouts, premium finishes, and tech-enabled features.

faqs.title: How large is the project and what is the land area?
items: The project is spread across approximately 9 acres, with generous open spaces and thoughtfully planned towers that enhance privacy and views.

faqs.title: How many towers and floors does Purva Atmosphere have?
items: Purva Atmosphere comprises 3 residential towers, each rising G + 34 floors, creating a landmark high-rise community in North Bangalore.

faqs.title: What makes Purva Atmosphere unique among luxury apartments in North Bangalore?
items: Key highlights include a rooftop clubhouse with sky deck and theatre, a signature cloud walk, a 40-ft air filtration tower, large open spaces, and a strong focus on wellness and lifestyle luxury.

faqs.title: Who is the developer of Purva Atmosphere?
items: Purva Atmosphere is developed by Puravankara Limited, a reputed real estate brand with over five decades of experience in premium housing.

faqs.title: Is Purva Atmosphere suitable for professionals working in Manyata Tech Park?
items: Yes. Its proximity to Manyata Tech Park makes it ideal for senior professionals seeking reduced commute time, premium living standards, and a calm residential environment.

faqs.title: What amenities are available at Purva Atmosphere?
items: Residents enjoy a rooftop clubhouse, sky deck, private theatre, cloud walk, landscaped open spaces, fitness facilities, leisure zones, and wellness-focused amenities.

faqs.title: What is the price range of apartments at Purva Atmosphere?
items: Luxury 3 BHK apartments at Purva Atmosphere are priced from ?2.85 Cr onwards*, depending on unit size, floor level, and view.

faqs.title: Is Purva Atmosphere a good option for long-term investment?
items: Yes. Strong demand drivers include proximity to IT hubs, limited supply of large luxury homes in Thanisandra, premium positioning, and strong brand value.

faqs.title: Does Purva Atmosphere offer good rental potential?
items: Yes. Luxury 3 BHK homes near Manyata Tech Park attract senior IT professionals, leadership roles, and expat tenants, supporting healthy rental demand.

faqs.title: Is Purva Atmosphere RERA approved?
items: Yes. Purva Atmosphere is RERA registered, ensuring transparency, regulatory compliance, and buyer protection as per applicable norms.

faqs.title: Are these homes suitable for end users or investors?
items: Both. End users benefit from spacious luxury living and wellness features, while investors gain from location strength, rental demand, and long-term appreciation potential.

faqs.title: How can I book a site visit or get detailed pricing?
items: You can request a guided site visit, receive the latest pricing and availability, and get unbiased assistance through PropYouLike.
